member.name: tagSTGMEDIUM
member.summary: Represents a generalized global memory handle used for data transfer operations by the , , and interfaces.

member.name: tagSTGMEDIUM.tymed
member.summary: The type of storage medium. The marshaling and unmarshaling routines use this value to determine which union member was used. This value must be one of the elements of the enumeration.

member.name: tagSTGMEDIUM.DUMMYUNIONNAME
member.summary: Handle, string, or interface pointer that the receiving process can use to access the data being transferred. If tymed is TYMED_NULL, the union member is undefined; otherwise, it is one of the following values.

member.name: tagSTGMEDIUM.DUMMYUNIONNAME.hBitmap
member.summary: Bitmap handle. The tymed member is TYMED_GDI.

member.name: tagSTGMEDIUM.DUMMYUNIONNAME.hMetaFilePict
member.summary: Metafile handle. The tymed member is TYMED_MFPICT.

member.name: tagSTGMEDIUM.DUMMYUNIONNAME.hEnhMetaFile
member.summary: Enhanced metafile handle. The tymed member is TYMED_ENHMF.

member.name: tagSTGMEDIUM.DUMMYUNIONNAME.hGlobal
member.summary: Global memory handle. The tymed member is TYMED_HGLOBAL.

member.name: tagSTGMEDIUM.DUMMYUNIONNAME.lpszFileName
member.summary: Pointer to the path of a disk file that contains the data. The tymed member is TYMED_FILE.

member.name: tagSTGMEDIUM.DUMMYUNIONNAME.pstm
member.summary: Pointer to an interface. The tymed member is TYMED_ISTREAM.

member.name: tagSTGMEDIUM.DUMMYUNIONNAME.pstg
member.summary: Pointer to an interface. The tymed member is TYMED_ISTORAGE.

member.name: tagSTGMEDIUM.pUnkForRelease
member.summary: Pointer to an interface instance that allows the sending process to control the way the storage is released when the receiving process calls the function. If pUnkForRelease is NULL, ReleaseStgMedium uses default procedures to release the storage; otherwise, ReleaseStgMedium uses the specified IUnknown interface.
